record.dc:title: 100BN25 Ledbetter, Benton County, Tennessee. Burial 9BN12. Adult male in good condition, fully flexed, head oriented to west, sitting up in pit, body originally rested on pelvis only. Conch shell pendant over pelvis. Note sitting position of burial. Square 20L3. Direction SW.
record.wpa:narrative: This burial is literally sitting up. The torso which had been above the pelvis has slumped. The right humerus, still in place, indicated that this is so. Between the femurs and the pelvis lies a pendent, an oblong object of conch shell.
